Guide.bot_info: A fun bot to generate and create emotes using different parts so that you can share them or save them to your Discord server.
Guide.parts_info: Use the list command to get emote parts for base, eyes, mouth and extras.
Guide.generate_info: You can generate an emote using the part numbers and the example below.
Guide.color_info: You can also add a color tint to emote parts using this.
Guide.color_warn: Some colors may not work well with different parts.
Guide.share_info: Share your emote with friends by copying the image link or use the save command to add it to your server.

Server.no_emotes: This server does not have any custom emotes.

Search.no_emote: Could not find an emote with that name.
Search.author: Author

Gen.list_info: Use the list command for parts
